mapper.sql: /*[TdspSysInf.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT SYS_CD /* 시스템코드 */ , SYS_NM /* 사이트명 */ , SYS_PTH /* 사이트경로 */ , US_YN /* 사용여부 */ , SRT_SEQ /* 정렬 순서 */ , DSPLY_YN /* 권한사용여부 */ , SYS_ABRV /* 약어 */ , CRTR_ID /* 생성자ID */ , CRT_DTTM /* 생성일시 */ , UPDR_ID /* 수정자ID */ , UPD_DTTM /* 수정일시 */ FROM TDSP_SYS_INF WHERE SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SRT_SEQ
mapper.select: /* [TdspSysInf.xml][selectTdspSysInf][시스템 정보 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT SYS_CD AS SYS_CD /* 사이트순번 */ , SYS_NM AS SYS_NM /* 사이트명 */ , SYS_PTH AS SYS_PTH /* 사이트경로 */ , SYS_URL AS SYS_URL /* 사이트URL */ , US_YN AS US_YN /* 사용여부 */ , SRT_SEQ AS SRT_SEQ /* 정렬순서 */ , DSPLY_YN AS DSPLY_YN /* 권한사용여부*/ , SYS_ABRV AS SYS_ABRV /* 약어명*/ , SYS_DESC AS SYS_DESC /* 사이트 설명 내용 */ , CRTR_ID AS CRTR_ID /* 생성자ID */ , CRT_DTTM AS CRT_DTTM /* 생성일시 */ , UPDR_ID AS UPDR_ID /* 수정자ID */ , UPD_DTTM AS UPD_DTTM /* 수정일시 */ FROM TDSP_SYS_INF WHERE SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SRT_SEQ

/* [TdspSysInf.xml][getAccessSitList][접근 가능한 사이트 정보 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT AA.SYS_CD , AA.SYS_NM , AA.SYS_PTH , CASE WHEN BB.SYS_CD IS NULL THEN "#" ELSE AA.SYS_URL END AS SYS_URL , AA.SRT_SEQ , AA.US_YN , AA.SRT_SEQ , AA.SYS_DESC , AA.CRTR_ID , AA.CRT_DTTM , AA.UPDR_ID , AA.UPD_DTTM FROM TDSP_SYS_INF AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT AR.SYS_CD FROM ( SELECT USR_ID , MAX(SYS_CL_CD) AS SYS_CL_CD , MAX(ORG_CD) AS ORG_CD , MAX(GRP_ROL_ID) AS GRP_ROL_ID , MAX(BLSTR_CD) AS BLSTR_CD , MAX(UM.BSLE_HDOFIC_CD) AS BSLE_HDOFIC_CD , GROUP_CONCAT(MSM.CSTR_CD) AS MSTR_CD , GROUP_CONCAT(MSM.CSTR_NM) AS MSTR_NM , GROUP_CONCAT(CSM.CSTR_CD) AS CSTR_CD , GROUP_CONCAT(CSM.CSTR_NM) AS CSTR_NM , MAX(SHOP_GRDE_CD) AS SHOP_GRDE_CD , MAX(BUY_GRDE_CD) AS BUY_GRDE_CD , MAX(MSTRS_USPR_ID) AS MSTR_USPR_ID , MAX(EXCV_YN) AS EXCV_YN , MAX(RGN_LDR_YN) AS RGN_LDR_YN FROM TB_BCPC_USPRATHR_M UM , TB_BCPC_STR_M MSM , TB_BCPC_STR_M CSM WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UM.MSTR_CD = MSM.CSTR_CD AND UM.CSTR_CD = CSM.CSTR_CD GROUP BY USR_ID ) T , TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL_RTNN GRR , TSYS_ADM_ROL AR WHERE T.GRP_ROL_ID = GRR.GRP_ROL_ID AND GRR.ROL_ID = AR.ROL_ID UNION SELECT AR.SYS_CD /*개인 권한에 대한 사이트*/ FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_ROL_RTNN ARR , TSYS_ADM_ROL AR WHERE AR.ROL_ID = ARR.ROL_ID AND ALI.USR_ID = ARR.USR_ID AND AR.US_YN = 'Y' AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALI.APVL_YN = 'Y' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN AR.APL_ST_DT AND AR.APL_ED_DT UNION SELECT AM.SYS_CD /*개인 메뉴에 대한 사이트*/ FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_MNU_RTNN AMR , TSYS_ADM_MNU AM WHERE ALI.USR_ID = AMR.USR_ID AND AMR.MNU_SEQ = AM.MNU_SEQ AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALI.APVL_YN = 'Y' ) BB ON AA.SYS_CD = BB.SYS_CD WHERE AA.US_YN = 'Y' AND AA.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AA.SRT_SEQ

/* [TdspSysInf.xml][getAccessSitList][디봇사이트 가능여부][TANINE] */ SELECT count(1) AS CNT FROM TDSP_SYS_INF AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT AR.SYS_CD /*조직별 권한에 대한 사이트*/ FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_ORG_GRP_ROL_RTNN OGRR , TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL_RTNN GRR , TSYS_ADM_ROL AR WHERE ALI.ORG_CD = OGRR.ORG_CD AND OGRR.GRP_ROL_ID = GRR.GRP_ROL_ID AND GRR.ROL_ID = AR.ROL_ID AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALI.APVL_YN = 'Y' AND AR.US_YN = 'Y' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN AR.APL_ST_DT AND AR.APL_ED_DT UNION SELECT DISTINCT AR.SYS_CD -- 직별책 통합 그룹의 권한 사이트 유무 FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_JBFN_RTNN AJR -- 직무코드 , TSYS_ADM_JBFN_GRP_ROL_RTNN AJGRR -- 통합 그룹 , TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL_RTNN AGRR -- 권한 코드 , TSYS_ADM_GRP_ROL AGR , TSYS_ADM_ROL AR WHERE 1=1 AND ALI.USR_ID = AJR.USR_ID AND AJR.JOB_CD = AJGRR.JOB_CD AND AJGRR.GRP_ROL_ID = AGRR.GRP_ROL_ID AND AGRR.GRP_ROL_ID = AGR.GRP_ROL_ID AND AGRR.ROL_ID = AR.ROL_ID AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN AR.APL_ST_DT AND AR.APL_ED_DT AND AGR.US_YN = 'Y' AND AR.US_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN AGR.APL_ST_DT AND AGR.APL_ED_DT UNION SELECT AR.SYS_CD /*개인 권한에 대한 사이트*/ FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_ROL_RTNN ARR , TSYS_ADM_ROL AR WHERE AR.ROL_ID = ARR.ROL_ID AND ALI.USR_ID = ARR.USR_ID AND AR.US_YN = 'Y' AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALI.APVL_YN = 'Y' AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN AR.APL_ST_DT AND AR.APL_ED_DT UNION SELECT AM.SYS_CD /*개인 메뉴에 대한 사이트*/ FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF ALI , TSYS_ADM_MNU_RTNN AMR , TSYS_ADM_MNU AM WHERE ALI.USR_ID = AMR.USR_ID AND AMR.MNU_SEQ = AM.MNU_SEQ AND AMR.APVL_YN = 'Y' AND ALI.USR_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALI.APVL_YN = 'Y' ) BB ON AA.SYS_CD = BB.SYS_CD WHERE AA.US_YN = 'Y' AND AA.DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND AA.SYS_PTH ='/DBOT'
